description: This file defines the Notification class within the WebSockets::JsonRpc namespace, representing a JSON RPC notification message. It provides constructor, destructor, and utility methods, and inherits from a base message class.

classes.name: Notification
classes.description: A class representing a JSON RPC notification message, inheriting from WPEFramework::Core::JSONRPC::Message, with methods for construction, destruction, and validation.

methods.name: Notification
methods.description: Default constructor for the Notification class.

methods.name: toString
methods.description: Returns a string representation of the notification.

methods.name: isValid
methods.description: Checks whether the notification is valid.
